column5: With the lake being frozen up nice and tight we decided to try out a new area today.  Headed out to about 100 fow and dropped our lines. It was a pretty slow day but we still managed 3 lakers and 3 whities, not bad, not great.  Spoons were the ticket... not a sniff on live bait.  P.S. It was COLD!
6 fish like that sounds like a good day to me.  That first white is a beaut!
Good stuff man!  That whitefish is gigantical
Looks like a good time for sure...anyday on the hardwater is a day well spent. I'll let Cobra know what you have been up too  -Dave
Oh he's well aware, and e should have been there a few times already.  If you talk to him, tell him to call me haha
i live with him lol. Ill let him know, he's working on Chemistry right now lol -Dave

Duude, you're killing me!  Was out on Simcoe on Saturday and I've never been skunked so badly...   Tried spoons, tubes, shinners and got bunk.  Same for most of the chaps out there too, while others did really well.  Beauty fish mang.  Maybe we'll cross paths someday.  I'll have to pick your brain.  cheers HD
Nice ice fishin trip/report steve !!! some very nice sized lakers & a very nice whitie.  ..great pics too !!! cheers
Great report and pics Steve  Congratulations    you guys did pretty good considering it was a slow day Great job and thanks for sharing Leechman
It was a tough day all around it seemed.  Not many people getting fish, and even for us it was pretty tough, lucky to land a few.  Saw a ton of fish on the vex, but they were very unaggressive.

"COLD".. it was only -5C today... but I hear ya. I think it was the dampness and that darn wind today. Was out for 8 hours on GBAY and very easy, when only -5c, to work up a sweat,,, socks get damp quicker etc.. = cold later.  Some nice fish there Steve and crew. Another great outing.
ef me purple thats a serious Whitie right there

Did you guys try the badboys??  We've been pounding them on those. Really jigging the heck out of it.  I haven't caught one fish on a williams yet!!! And I'm a faithful williams user!!!  That one whitie is a friggen HOG!!!  Sinker
Theyve been eating the spoon pretty good lately, so I havent tried the bad boyz this year
really niceley done!  I'm stocked up on badboyz and a few more williams spoons...I'll take a poll on Friday hopefully to find out which they prefer

Sorry about the hut I didn't get your text till sunday. I went out of Hawkesotne on sunday bout 3.5-4 km out 90 fow, 1 Lt & 2 WF,all on williams, Didn't make it out to where I wanted, Give me a shout and I'll send you in the direction of some hard water bows.. We gotta get out sometime dude  Gallimore
